AILogging Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Conforms to AILoggingProtocol

AILogging.m

Overview

This class encapsulates implementation and business logic of logging.

– createInstanceForComponent:componentVersion:

This method creates and returns a logging wrapper object which can be used for logging events and messages.

- (id<AILoggingProtocol>)createInstanceForComponent:(NSString *)componentId componentVersion:(NSString *)componentVersion

Parameters

componentId

Identifier of the requesting component
componentVersion

Version of the requesting component

Return Value

Returns an object that conforms to ‘AILoggingProtocol’ protocol.

– log:eventId:message:

Logs given message to configured output sink

- (void)log:(AILogLevel)level eventId:(NSString *)eventId message:(NSString *)message

Parameters

level of log
eventId

identifier of the event being logged
message
